goal.ch: This course is the second in a series of two, devised to improve upper-intermediate learners’ business communication skills with a focus on three aspects of the English language: speaking techniques, listening competence, and vocabulary power, in order of priority. Through choice skills-based coursebook and other task-based supplementary materials, students can learn to communicate real meaning in natural context, which offers them opportunities to further develop their background knowledge, critical thinking, managerial capability, in addition to the focused language acquisition. Upon completion of the course, students will be able to communicate more diplomatically, thereby more skillfully and effectively, demonstrating functional language in everyday business scenarios towards problem-solving ability.

outline.ch:
**語言學習需要定期付出時間與努力才易有成效。
**課程內容與評量始自第一週，有選上或有興趣加選的同學，都請準時到課，避免成績損失。

gradMethod.ch:
(tentative grading scheme)

Foremost among all evaluations is students‘ adherence to speaking only English, arriving punctually, and refraining from the use of electronic devices in class, violation of which may adversely lower their final grade.

1. Attendance / Activity / Attitude – 25％
2. Vocabulary Builders – 15％
3. Listening ＆ Vocabulary Achievement Test – 20％
4. Term Exhibit (Negotiation or Debate) – 20％
5. Term Project (Negotiation) – 20％
6. Bonus (Listening Drills / TOEIC / Linguaskill Business) – 5％
